Attrition.description: Whether the employee left the company or not.

value_dict.No: The employee stayed in the company.

BusinessTravel.description: The frequency of business travel for the employee.

value_dict.Travel_Rarely: The employee rarely travels for business.
value_dict.Travel_Frequently: The employee frequently travels for business.
value_dict.Non-Travel: The employee does not travel for business.

Department.description: The department in which the employee works.

value_dict.Research & Development: The employee works in the Research & Development department.
value_dict.Sales: The employee works in the Sales department.
value_dict.Human Resources: The employee works in the Human Resources department.

DistanceFromHome.description: The distance from work to home.

value_dict.2: The employee has a medium-low job involvement.
value_dict.3: The employee has a medium-high job involvement.
value_dict.1: The employee has a low job involvement.
value_dict.4: The employee has a high job involvement.

value_dict.1: The employee is at job level 1.
value_dict.3: The employee is at job level 3.
value_dict.2: The employee is at job level 2.
value_dict.5: The employee is at job level 5.
value_dict.4: The employee is at job level 4.

JobRole.description: The role of the employee in the company.

value_dict.Laboratory Technician: The employee is a Laboratory Technician.
value_dict.Research Scientist: The employee is a Research Scientist.
value_dict.Research Director: The employee is a Research Director.
value_dict.Sales Representative: The employee is a Sales Representative.
value_dict.Sales Executive: The employee is a Sales Executive.
value_dict.Manufacturing Director: The employee is a Manufacturing Director.
value_dict.Healthcare Representative: The employee is a Healthcare Representative.
value_dict.Human Resources: The employee is in Human Resources.

JobSatisfaction.description: Rating of the employee's job satisfaction.

value_dict.3: The employee has a medium-high job satisfaction.
value_dict.4: The employee has a high job satisfaction.
value_dict.1: The employee has a low job satisfaction.
value_dict.2: The employee has a medium-low job satisfaction.

MaritalStatus.description: The marital status of the employee.

MonthlyIncome.description: The monthly income of the employee.

NumCompaniesWorked.description: The number of companies the employee worked at.

OverTime.description: Whether the employee works overtime or not.

value_dict.No: The employee does not work overtime.

PercentSalaryHike.description: The percentage of the employee's salary hike.

PerformanceRating.description: The rating of the employee's performance.

value_dict.3: The employee has a performance rating of 3.
value_dict.4: The employee has a performance rating of 4.

StockOptionLevel.description: The level of the employee's stock option.

value_dict.0: The employee has a stock option level of 0.
value_dict.1: The employee has a stock option level of 1.
value_dict.2: The employee has a stock option level of 2.
value_dict.3: The employee has a stock option level of 3.

TotalWorkingYears.description: The total number of years the employee has worked.

TrainingTimesLastYear.description: The number of times the employee had training last year.

YearsAtCompany.description: The number of years the employee has worked at the company.

YearsSinceLastPromotion.description: The number of years since the employee's last promotion.

YearsWithCurrManager.description: The number of years the employee has been with their current manager.

Higher_Education.description: Whether the employee has higher education or not.

value_dict.Graduation: The employee has a graduation degree.
value_dict.Post-Graduation: The employee has a post-graduation degree.

Date_of_Hire.description: The date when the employee was hired.

Date_of_termination.description: The date when the employee was terminated.

Status_of_leaving.description: The status of the employee leaving the company.

value_dict.Salary: The employee left due to salary.
value_dict.Work Accident: The employee left due to a work accident.
value_dict.Dept.Head: The employee left due to the department head.
value_dict.Better Opportunity: The employee left for a better opportunity.
value_dict.Work Environment: The employee left due to the work environment.

value_dict.OFFICE: The employee works in the office.

Leaves.description: The number of leaves the employee took.

Absenteeism.description: The level of absenteeism of the employee.

value_dict.2: The employee has a medium-low level of absenteeism.
value_dict.3: The employee has a medium-high level of absenteeism.
value_dict.0: The employee has a low level of absenteeism.
value_dict.1: The employee has a high level of absenteeism.

Work_accident.description: Whether the employee had a work accident or not.

value_dict.No: The employee has not had a work accident.
value_dict.Yes: The employee has had a work accident.

Source_of_Hire.description: The source from which the employee was hired.

value_dict.Job Event: The employee was hired from a job event.
value_dict.Recruiter: The employee was hired through a recruiter.
value_dict.Job Portal: The employee was hired through a job portal.
value_dict.Walk-in: The employee was a walk-in applicant.

value_dict.Contract: The employee is on a contract.

Unnamed: 32.description: Unnamed column, seems to be an artifact from data preparation.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in HR data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the attrition status.
prompt.answer_prompt: The employee left the company[1] or The employee stayed in the company[0]?

class_value_dict.No: The employee stayed in the company.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in HR data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the job satisfaction level.

class_value_dict.3: The employee has a medium-high job satisfaction.
class_value_dict.4: The employee has a high job satisfaction.
class_value_dict.1: The employee has a low job satisfaction.
class_value_dict.2: The employee has a medium-low job satisfaction.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in HR data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the performance rating.
prompt.answer_prompt: The employee has a performance rating of 3[0] or 4[1]?

class_value_dict.3: The employee has a performance rating of 3.
class_value_dict.4: The employee has a performance rating of 4.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in HR data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict the reason for leaving.
prompt.answer_prompt: The employee left due to salary[0], work accident[1], department head[2], better opportunity[3] or work environment[4]?

class_value_dict.Salary: The employee left due to salary.
class_value_dict.Work Accident: The employee left due to a work accident.
class_value_dict.Dept.Head: The employee left due to the department head.
class_value_dict.Better Opportunity: The employee left for a better opportunity.
class_value_dict.Work Environment: The employee left due to the work environment.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in HR data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the employee, please predict if the employee has had a work accident.
prompt.answer_prompt: The employee has not had a work accident[0] or has had a work accident[1]?

class_value_dict.No: The employee has not had a work accident.
class_value_dict.Yes: The employee has had a work accident.
